content.prompt: Country A has a Gini coefficient of 0.5, and Country B has a Gini coefficient of 0.3. Which of the following statements is definitely true?

choices.label: Country A has higher average income than Country B.
Country B has higher average income than Country A.
Income is more evenly distributed in Country A than in Country B.
Income is more evenly distributed in Country B than in Country A.
Country A has more deadweight loss than Country B.

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
